abstract: JPMorgan Chase said the market value of its investments in Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac preferred stock has dropped by half to $600 million this quarter, casting a pall on Freddie’s successful $2 billion debt offering.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase said the market value of its investments in Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac preferred stock has dropped by half to $600 million this quarter, casting a pall on Freddie’s successful $2 billion debt offering.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase said the market value of its investments in Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac preferred stock has dropped by half to $600 million this quarter.

headline.main: JPMorgan’s Warning Casts Pall on Freddie’s Good News
